question: What was "Jose Carlos Schwarz" famous for?
option1: As a poet and musician from Liberia
option2: As a poet and musician from Senegal
option3: As a poet and musician from Guinea-Bissau
option4: As a poet and musician from Kenya
answer: As a poet and musician from Guinea-Bissau
explanation: Jose Carlos Schwarz was a Bissau-Guinean poet and musician. He is widely regarded as one of the most important and influential musicians of Guinea-Bissau. He also became politically active and joined the resistance against the colonial ruler. He was imprisoned for his participation in the struggle for the independence of his country. Inspired by this experience, he composed the song "Djiu Di Galinha".
